definition: (of family members) separated from one another/scattered about/dispersed/(math.) discrete
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack

sentences.english: Optimization controller for linear discrete-time state space model is designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计出线性离散状态空间的最优控制器。

sentences.english: The concept of cultural diasporic has been introduced to translation study recently.
sentences.chinese: 文化离散是近期在翻译界提出的新概念。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of enalapril therapy on QT dispersion in hypertensive patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨依那普利对高血压患者QT离散度的影响。

sentences.english: In chapter 3, The properties of chaotic group actions are considered.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，考虑离散群的混沌作用。

sentences.english: Then we consider an double-integrator discrete time system model.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了三种连续群体系统和一种离散系统。

sentences.english: Discrete Cosines Transform(DCT) is an effective tool for analysis image signal.
sentences.chinese: 离散余弦变换是分析图像信号的有效工具。

sentences.english: The loca of continuous models and discrete models are presented and analysed.
sentences.chinese: 并给出连续与离散模型的走势分析。

sentences.english: The finite volume discretization method and treatment of boundary condition were presented.
sentences.chinese: 采用有限容积法离散方程，附加源项法处理边界条件。

sentences.english: This problem can be solved by using GFT technique.
sentences.chinese: 采用广义离散付氏变换可以解决这个问题。

sentences.english: R. P. Grimaldi, Discrete and Combinational Mathematics (5th edition), Pearson Education, 2004.
sentences.chinese: 戴显权，基础离散数学，旗标出版公司，2004。

sentences.english: The finite difference method was used to discretize and solve the two phase energy equations.
sentences.chinese: 采用有限差分法对两相能量方程进行离散求解。

sentences.english: The private education market is highly fragmented in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，个人教育市场是高度离散的。

sentences.english: For, lo, thine enemies, O LORD, for, lo, thine enemies shall perish; all the workers of iniquity shall be scattered.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华阿，你的仇敌都要灭亡，一切作孽的也要离散。

sentences.english: The boundary integral equation is discretized using constant and linear boundary elements.
sentences.chinese: 边界积分方程分别用常数和线性边界元来离散。

sentences.english: The theory of discrete-event dynamic systems(DEDS)abounds in applications.
sentences.chinese: 离散事件动态系统理论的应用十分广泛。

sentences.english: An algorithm for data approximation with global optimal biarc spline is presented in this article.
sentences.chinese: 提出了用整体最优双圆弧样条拟合离散数据点的算法。

definition: destitute and homeless (idiom); displaced and without means
homeless and miserable/forced to leave home and wander from place to place/to live as a refugee
lit. dispersed by wind and scattered like clouds (idiom); fig. scattered far and wide (of friends and relatives)
to fall and wither (like autumn leaves)/(fig.) drifting and homeless
destitute and homeless (idiom); forced from one's home and wandering about/displaced
to ebb and rise/to decrease and then grow
